meanings.sent1: The radwaste was carefully sealed in a lead container.
meanings.sent2: The workers wore protective suits while handling the radwaste.
meanings.sent3: Why did the radioactive chicken cross the road? To get to the radwaste disposal site!
meanings.sent4: The radwaste glowed like a dangerous beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The radwaste posed a serious threat to the environment.

meanings.sent1: The radwaste from the nuclear plant needed to be disposed of safely.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying ways to reduce the amount of radwaste produced.
meanings.sent3: The radwaste decided to throw a party in the radioactive dump.
meanings.sent4: The radwaste leaked into the soil, contaminating everything around.
meanings.sent5: The radwaste barrels were labeled with warning signs.
